评论详情: These 18K gold-plated teardrop earrings are an elegant addition to any woman's jewelry collection. Their minimalist style makes them perfect for daily casual wear, adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. The dangle design is simple yet brilliant, catching the light beautifully. They're lightweight and comfortable to wear throughout the day, making them ideal for both work and leisure. As a gift, they're sure to make any Mother's Day or special occasion memorable. Overall, they're stylish earrings that blend timeless elegance with modern simplicity. Highly recommend for anyone looking to add a subtle sparkle to their ensemble!

Wife got the gold pair of these to wear to some fancier events that she needed to attend, and we both think they look great.  Material quality is good, and the gold color is very pleasing. They look quite large, but aren't actually that heavy since they're completely hollow. They do a good job of hiding the cavity in the rear since they have so much curvature. No real complaints!

Earrings came with the rubber back instead of metal- feels a little cheap. The earrings are shiny and without scratches, and the packaging was nice. The earrings are nice- I think the sizing is a bit awkward but that’s personal preference. I haven’t had them long enough to know how they hold up.
